p: Mice were intravenously (i.v.) injected with 3 μg anti-CD45-APC/eFluor780 (clone: 30-F11; BioLegend). Mice were euthanatized 3–5 min after injection, and blood, spleen and lungs were collected. Following their isolation from the respective compartment, lymphocytes were stained and analyzed as described above.
